insert into business (hashed_pwd, salt, avatar, business_name, representation_name, representation_idcard, email, tel, introduction, login_time, is_verified, gmt_create, gmt_modified, follower_count) values (#{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{representationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{representationIdcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{introduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isVerified,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{followerCount,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update business set hashed_pwd = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, salt = #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, avatar = #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, business_name = #{businessName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, representation_name = #{representationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, representation_idcard = #{representationIdcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, introduction = #{introduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, login_time = #{loginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_verified = #{isVerified,jdbcType=TINYINT}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, follower_count = #{followerCount,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, hashed_pwd, salt, avatar, business_name, representation_name, representation_idcard, email, tel, introduction, login_time, is_verified, gmt_create, gmt_modified, follower_count from business where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
